content: the designer is greatly appreciated but not required irarott® photos cannot be used for selling purposes or modified in any way you may not use the irarott® trademark in your listing name or as a tag you may include pattern from irarott com in your listing description safety regulations use a guide for safety regulations and standards in your country to make and/or distribute clothing toys accessories & homeware you may alter irarott® patterns to meet your safety guide all handmade items from irarott® patterns should be used/worn under adult su- pervision only items that contain small parts pins detachable pieces snaps buttons zipper heads bows rhinestones decorative appliqués ties drawstrings shoelaces ribbons and other dangling attachments should not be used as toys as sleepwear or while unsupervised com t t o r a r i christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com
